subject: Dear trusted friend,
body:
Dear trusted friend,
Good day to you. I have a good and viable business plan with/for you.
Let me hear from you so that i can elucidate your clear understanding.
Remain blessed until i hear from you.
Mr. Sanche More.

subject: Re:   Dear trusted friend,
body:
Dear Mr. Sanche More,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I'm always open to hearing about new business opportunities, so I would be interested in learning more about your business plan. Could you please provide me with some details? What industry is it in and what makes it viable?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: Re: Dear trusted friend Crystal,
body:
Dear Trusted friend  Mr  Crystal   . This business is real and will help
both of us in this life.
I am Mr. Sanche More, An accountant with FLU OIL CO, A  foreign oil company
based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
FLU OIL COMPANY,was involved in prospecting, drilling and bunkering of oil
at high sea {offshore} with expatriates consisting majority of the staff
strength.
 Unfortunately, these expatriates got into illegal sales of oil and the
fund was transferred through a security company out of the country but with
a security stamp on it. The government of UAE discovered the illegal deal
,and revoked their license and the expatriates were repatriated.so by
virtue of my position as the accountant of the company, i have in my
possession documents containing the information about three of these trunk
boxes deposited with the security  company the content of these boxes is
thirty eight million USD {$38.m}.I have put in an application with the
security company to transfer these boxes to their correspondence office in
 United State of America and Europe which they have obliged and being that
this deal has been carried out by foreign firm, I need a trustworthy
foreigner like you that will assist me to logical conclusion of this
pending business which both of us will bound to benefit earnestly from the
transaction right. All I need from you is to stand before the security
company and sign as one of the expatriates to enable you to claim the money
and pay it into your Bank account please.
Note that this transaction is 100% risk free, for every machinery has been
put in place for successful smooth conclusion of the transaction. remember,
that i have with me all the necessary documents that will prove and present
that that the money is for us.
I expect you to be trustworthy and kind enough to keep my own part of the
money, when the money get to your account. I hereby agree to compensate
your sincere and candid effort in this regard with 25% of the fund after
the transfer and 5% will be set aside  for any expenses both local and
international transportation, telephone bills etc. will be settled from
this percentage while 70% will be for me and two of my colleagues. This
deal will be  concluded within seven {7} working days. I will be looking
forward to doing business with you and solicit your confidentiality in this
transaction. Please acknowledge the receipt of this proposal via my email
and send me your private telephone number for easier communication .
Expecting to hear from you as soon as possible.
Kind regards

Mr,Sanche More
Cell  +971527328353

subject: Re: Dear trusted friend Crystal,
body:
Dear Mr. More,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust and confidence in involving me in this business venture. I understand that you have three trunk boxes containing a total of thirty-eight million USD, which were deposited with a security company due to illegal sales of oil by FLU OIL.

I would like to know more about the process involved in transferring these boxes to the United States or Europe. Could you please provide me with further details on how we can proceed? Additionally, what are the necessary documents that you mentioned, and how can we ensure a smooth and successful conclusion to this business?

I am also curious about the risks involved in this transaction. While you mentioned that it is risk-free, I would appreciate any additional information or assurances you can provide regarding the legality and safety of this endeavor.

Furthermore, could you clarify how the compensation will be distributed? You mentioned that a percentage will be set aside for expenses, but I would like to understand the exact breakdown of the distribution between yourself and your two associates.

Lastly, I would prefer to communicate via email for now. However, if necessary, I can provide my private telephone number at a later stage.

Thank you once again for considering me as your partner in this business opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: Re: Dear trusted friend Crystal,
body:
Dear Brother,
I received your mail and read below the lines. The contents are well
understood and noted as well.
Like i explained to you before now, the documents involved are with me here
and it remains just one document
and i will ensure it is secured and let you know.
Once i try my best and obtain the legal empowering document on your name as
the bonafide claimat of the claimat
in question. And as soon as the remaining document is secured, you will
contact the security vault in Madrid Spain,
Europe and apply for the immediate release of the funds to your favor and i
know that with all the necessary legal
documents on your name,they will attend to you positively,okay.
For me, send your details to me now so that i can try and get the remaining
document on your name for the claiming
process. Full name,contact address,telephone numbers,id card copy.
Thereafter,we can proceed progressively.
I look forward hearing from you.
Yours reliable friend / partner
Mr.Sanche More.

subject: Re: Dear trusted friend Crystal,
body:
Dear Brother,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate your efforts in securing the necessary documents for the claiming process. I understand that there is one remaining document that needs to be obtained before we can proceed.

Could you please provide me with more information about this document? What is its purpose and why is it needed for the claiming process? Also, could you clarify what you mean by "Full card copy"? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the requirements.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: Re: Dear trusted friend Crystal,
body:
Dear Brother Crystalr,
Brother, what i meant is your complete details for procession of the legal
empowering document for the claim.
And without the authority to claim document on your name, the security
vault where the funds are deposited will
not attend to you.
So send me your complete name,house or office address,reachable phone
numbers,id card copy,either driving license or international passport copy.
All this listed items are required so as to obtain the very legal
empowering document so that you can contact the security vault and apply
for the release of the funds to your favor so as to progress.
Looking forward to hear from you.
Mr, Mr, Sanche More.

subject: Re: Dear trusted friend Crystal,
body:
Dear Mr. Sanche More,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in helping me obtain the legal empowering document for the claim. However, I have a few questions before I proceed.

1. Can you please explain in more detail what the legal empowering document is and how it will help me with the claim?

2. What exactly is the security vault where the funds are deposited? How does it work?

3. Is there any other way to prove my identity and authority to claim without providing my complete personal information such as phone card, driving license, or passport copy?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear trusted friend Crystal,

Your questions are well understood and noted as well, the empowering
document mainly is an authority to claim documents. And it will be obtained
from the Federal Ministry of Justice, UAE. And it is your legal right to
claim the funds peacefully
and calmly from the security vault, in Madrid Spain where the funds are
lodged for security purpose. And With the very document on your name, the
security vault  will not say ''No'' to you. Or question you much on the
claim. With the legal empowering document on your name, No suspicion on you
after tendering the legal empowering document to the security vault for the
claim. All they need to do do is to examine the documents and attend to you
positively,okay.And the claim will be made swift and successful,okay.
Furthermore, the security vault is like a finance company where precious
things or finance or gold items are being kept for pure security purposes.
This very one is in Madrid, Spain, Europe. I will send the deposit document
to you and my id card copy so that you will understand that it is not a
joking thing at all. For I am lead to you for this magnitude of trust and
task. And i will appreciate it if you keep to yourself everything till we
come to the good / successful conlclusion of the claim. And after you claim
the funds successfully and lodge the funds into your bank account in your
country or in Madrid Spain, then i will arrange myself and come to your
place to meet you face to face for our sharing of the huge funds. You will
also help me for my investment in your place if possible.
Looking forward to hearing from you today so as to progress.
Mr,Sanche More.

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear Crystal,

Thank you for providing me with more information. I appreciate your explanation about the empowering document and how it will help me claim the funds from the security vault in Madrid, Spain. It's good to know that with this document, there won't be any suspicion or questioning when I go to claim the funds.

Could you please clarify how exactly I can obtain this empowering document from the Federal Ministry of Justice in UAE? Is there a specific process or paperwork that needs to be completed? Also, what are the next steps once I have the empowering document? How do I proceed with claiming the funds from the security vault?

I understand that this is a serious matter and I assure you that I will keep everything confidential until we successfully complete the claim. However, before proceeding further, could you please provide some proof of your identity and credibility? It would help build trust between us.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear trusted friend Crystal,
Thanks for your quick response. But I have already sent to you my id card
copy and the deposit document of the funds in question.
And it is up to you, as soon as I receive your requested details,Your full
name,correct contact address,reachable phone numbers and id card copy. it
is also my duty to process and secure the main empowering legal document
and it will take me 2 or 3 days to get it done. And i will send/ forward
them to you with the contact details of the security vault to contact them
and apply for immediate release of the funds to your favor.
 I am eager to conclude this claim on time so as to arrange and come over
to your country for our face to face meeting and celebration.
Mr,Sanche More.

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear Crystal,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your efforts in processing and securing the necessary legal documents for the release of the funds. However, before I provide you with my full contact phone numbers and ID card copy, I would like to clarify a few things.

1. Could you please explain in more detail how the security vault works? How can I be assured that my funds will be released safely and promptly?

2. What are the next steps once I have provided you with my contact details and ID card copy? How long does it usually take for the funds to be released after that?

3. You mentioned arranging a face-to-face meeting in my country. Can you provide more information about this? What is the purpose of the meeting and what should I expect?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear Crystal,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your efforts in processing and securing the necessary legal documents for the release of the funds. It's great to hear that we are making progress towards concluding this claim.

I understand that you require my full contact phone numbers and ID card copy. Before I provide you with those details, could you please clarify which specific contact numbers you need? Additionally, I would like to know more about the security vault and how I should proceed with contacting them for the release of the funds.

Once we have all the necessary information in place, I look forward to arranging a face-to-face meeting with you in my country. It will be wonderful to finally meet and discuss further plans.

Thank you again for your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear trusted friend Crystal,
This is the process. After the necessary documents are obtained legally.I
will send them to you with the contact details of the security vault. I am
thinking that the explanation is comprehensive by now. Thereafter, it is
your role to contact the security vault and apply for the release and
negotiate with them when you can come for it.
And I will come to your place after you have claimed it successfully and
lodge it in an account peacefully. Then i will arrange and come over calmly
to your place.
Please if you have more questions to ask  in this regard,do ask now, i will
explain your clear understanding,okay.
Do not panic. It is stressless and viable to both of us.
Mr,Sanche More.

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear Crystal,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I appreciate your trust in me. I have a few questions regarding the process you mentioned.

1. What are the necessary documents that need to be obtained? Could you please provide more details about them?
2. Can you explain how I should contact the security vault? Is there a specific procedure or person I should reach out to?
3. Are there any fees or costs associated with the release of the funds from the security vault? If so, what are they and how should I handle them?
4. Could you clarify what you mean by "lodge it in an account"? Which account should I use, and are there any specific instructions for that?

I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding. Thank you for your patience in answering my questions.

Best wishes,
Crystal

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear trusted friend Crystal,
My name is Mr,Sanche More and not crystal,oka.Do not confuse me. You are
crystal,
And please try to be more serious and no joke at all,please.
All the document needed to provide to the security vault for the release is
the
Authorisation document and the deposit document with your identififation as
i explained
to you and nothing more.If anyother thing needed,that will be let you know
by the security vault.
Therefore,if you want to work it out with me in this regard,let me know and
send your details
to me for the legal process.
Or else, no issue,okay.
Mr,Sanche More.

subject: Re: ol49346@***.com
body:
Dear Crystal,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your seriousness in this matter. Could you please provide me with more information about the document and deposit document that need to be provided to the security vault? I want to make sure I understand the process correctly.

Also, could you explain what the legal process entails? I want to ensure that everything is done properly and legally.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Crystal
